00224    template <class Archive>
00225    void StructureFactor::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00226    {
00227       if (!isInitialized_) {
00228          UTIL_THROW("Error: Object not initialized.");
00229       }
00230       ar & structureFactors_;
00231       ar & fourierModes_;
00232       ar & nSample_;
00233 
00234       serializeCheck(ar, nAtomType_, "nAtomType");
00235       serializeCheck(ar, nMode_, "nMode");
00236       serializeCheck(ar, nWave_, "nWave");
00237       for (int i = 0; i < nWave_; ++i) {
00238          serializeCheck(ar, waveIntVectors_[i], "waveIntVector");
00239       }
00240    }
